    Art Portfolio

    The visual and fine arts are a big part of my personality and something that has been with me from an early age. It has taught me patience, creativity and attention to detail, things I believe I implicitly bring into my technical work and research.

    Showcasing my artworks was a big motivating factor for creating this website and I hope you enjoy them as much as I enjoyed making them.

    A big shout-out to the people who inspired and supported these and countless of other unpublished drawings. You guys know who you are.



    The Clarks

    Commission works for Donny, a provider of good times, memories and wisdom; (2021)

    The Barrys

    Commission works for Queen Barry, a dear and life-long friend from Groningen; (2019)

    The Van Wies

    Commission works for M, my mother away from home in Groningen; (2019)

    The Gronx

    Dedicated to all my dear friends; (2017-2020)

    Dragonfly Illustrations

    Pencil illustration done in collaboration with my father for the 2019 New Zealand Dragonfly fieldguide; (2018)

    Cersei Lannister

    GOT Fan Art; (2017)

    A handsome young man

    A gift for one of my favourite people; (2016)

    Post Highschool Days

    The period of work between finishing highschool and starting my Univesity adventures; (2015)

    Heisenberg

    Mr White. One of my bigger projects completed for my highschool chemistry teacher; (2014)

    Highschool Days

    Early works done during my highschool days, when the emerging interest of drawing people first started; (2012-2013)
